text: Fans were elated to hear that Tom Jackson, the fan - favourite client from Netflix ’ s “ Queer Eye ”, was back together with his ex - wife Abby. And with the recent news that the pair is engaged, they are losing their minds. Viewers fell in love with Jackson and his search to rekindle his love for Abby, and at the end of his episode, called “ You Can ’ t Fix Ugly ”, Jackson and Abby seemed to hit it off. After initially reporting they had broken up, Jackson surprised fans, including Brie Larson, with the happy news that he and Abby are an item once more.
